item.description:
Join Us On Saturday July 26 for the 22nd Connecticut Jazz Festival

2 Sessions are available - 11am to 5 pm or 6pm to 12:30 pm
We are going to be at BOTH sessions
FREE Restaurant gift card if you buy tickets for both sessions!


All Of The Activities At The Sunrise Resort Are Included With Your Ticket!

Swim in the 50' x 100' pool, boat along the lovely Salmon River, sit in a hot tub, Sauna, play mini golf ($2), and play on all of the various sporting courts (tennis, basketball, volleyball, shuffleboard), swim, boat, shoot some pool, play air hockey, rock climbing walls, bocce, ping-pong

Camping options and multi-day passes are also available

Bring your chairs, blankets, swim suit, etc and join us for a fun day of great music and outdoor activities!
Look for our section with the CTLIVEMusic.com signs

Tickets are $30 per session
Online Special - $25 Online Until June 30 2008

We have a limited number of tickets in our section, so get your seat before we sell out!

The Great Connecticut Traditional Jazz Festival is the largest festival in all of the Northeast featuring old time jazz. Great bands from around the world perform under 4 tents/venues providing entertainment for your entire family as well as your friends.
The Sunrise Resort in Moodus - a perfect match for a festival wanting to promote both great music and a day or weekend event. Sunrise boasts 140 acres, has a 50' x 100' pool, boating on the Salmon River, whirlpools, mini golf, many court games plus lots more!


MUSIC INCLUDES:

Blue Street - CA
Cornet Chop Suey - MO
Igor's Jazz Cowboys - AZ
Midiri Brothers Sextet - NJ
Galvanized Jazz Band - CT
Swing '39 - CT
Heartbeat Jazz Band - CT
The Bearcats Jazz Band - CT & NY
Jeff Barnhart's Coast to Coast All Stars - CT
Ivory and Gold - CT
Jazz'M - CT and New Orleans
Sarah Spencer's Transatlantic Band
Sugarfoot Jazz Band (TGCTJF's Youth Band)
Washboard Slim and The Blue Lights - CT

Only 25 minutes from Hartford

Don't miss this party!

For more info, visit www.CTJazzFest.com or call (860) 436-9449

We have a limited number of tickets in our section, so get your seat before we sell out!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for our section with the CTLIVEMusic.com signs

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: SOLD OUT 22nd Connecticut Jazz Festival at the Sunrise Resort Sat July 26
